features: ✔ VERSATILE USAGE: The multi-purpose Folding Dining Chairs can be used as dining chair, bistro chair, visitor chair, office chair, camping chair, conference chair, garden chair, a great choice for party planner for extra seating.

✔ COMFY CHAIRS: Ergonomic medium high cushion back keep your back supported and aligned, the comfortable folding chairs with padded seats be covered by skin-friendly fabric, provides comfortable sitting experience, allowing you relax completely.
✔ QUALITY MATERIALS:The kitchen modern folding chairs be made of quality solid wood, durable and stable; High resilience sponge cushion, soft and comfortable. Weight capacity 250lbs.
✔ SPACE SAVING: Foldable Dining Chairs design, when not in use, they can be easily lifted and stored in the corner, under the bed or in the car. Overall Size 19"x21.25"x34"/Folding19"x5.5"x39".
✔ MULTI-PURPOSE: Set of 2, light weight design. Whether it is at home for dinners, or go out for activities or outdoor barbecue, the nice foldable Chairs can be carried at any time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ball & Cast Multi-purpose Folding Chairs Perfect for Dining Room, Living Room,Office and Conference Room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dining chairs that are solid and comfortable, look great and store easily
reviews.reviewText: I need folding chairs so the whole family can get together but most of the time we just use 2 chairs when we don't have company. These chairs fold very easily and store well, but they still offer every bit of comfort that a classy dining chair has. The upholstery doesn't stain easily and spots come up well, but the fabric is quality and classy. I'm always proud to use them when we have guests.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern folding chairs
reviews.reviewText: First, there is no assembly. They come fully assembled. The cushioned seat is comfortable. They fold easily. They are heavy. I do wish they were a tiny bit more narrow for our purpose, but they are the highest quality folding chair I have ever owned. Set of 2. Very nice. Having said all of this, I never hesitate to update my reviews should new info seem useful. All of my reviews reflect my honest, personal experience with the reviewed item - your experience may be different. I am not influenced by any outside source. I receive/accept NO free products or discounts that are not available to all shoppers- ever. As a top 30 reviewer, I've been doing reviews for over 25 years with Amazon - over 6,200 reviews posted, those reviews have been viewed well over 50,000 times, including well over 28,000 likes. BOTTOM LINE: I pay for all my stuff, just like you do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars look great, fold nicely!
reviews.reviewText: love the look, the fabric, the cushioning, how nicely they fold. Seem sturdy and will last years. Don’t yet know how easy the fabric will be to clean if stained, but these def look classy/expensive for folding chairs and the price is great. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not inexpensive but I'm satisfied!
reviews.reviewText: These chairs were what I needed to host Christmas this year - they look like furniture rather than folding chairs, which was important to me. I like a firm comfortable seat and these chairs provide that. Sturdy, attractive - I know I will get a lot of use from these chairs for years to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, quality chairs
reviews.reviewText: These are quite sturdy for folding chairs, and are much better looking and more comfortable than any generic metal folding chair I've ever sat on. Easily worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Attractive. Good price.
reviews.reviewText: Seem to be well made, but haven’t had them long enough to judge durability. Attractive but not as comfortable as they look. OK for a meal, but wouldn’t want to sit for long periods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful quality chairs
reviews.reviewText: These chairs are a wonderful addition to our home. They look like fine furniture and don't need to be hidden away in a closet when not in use. They accessorize nicely any room they're in. Easy to clean up, comfortable, and not too heavy to move around. We've used them at our formal dining table for extra seating and they fit in nicely. Also use them in our guest bedrooms and have one at my writing desk. Bought 4 and liked so much we bought two more! No assembly required and arrived quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Holidays
reviews.reviewText: Better than your standard folding chair. Comfortable, they look expensive. They seem like they are going to last many years. They will be great to use during holidays or gatherings when we need more seating.

reviews.reviewTitle: Really sturdy, nice art deco-ish style
reviews.reviewText: Wanted something lightweight and easy to transport for home staging. These fit the bill. Really nice, well made chairs. The cherry look rubberwood is not my favourite, but I may try to refinish them later if I get bothered enough by it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best folding chairs I have purchased
reviews.reviewText: I bought other folding chairs for my dining table before. I had hard time keeping them and despite of the trouble of carrying large boxes, I ended up returning them because they were either too bulky when folded, not sturdy enough (one even broke when I tried to unfold, etc.). This one, however, is exactly what I wanted. It folds and unfolds very easily. It takes up the smallest footprint of all the folding chairs I have tried. Highly recommend!
Great match to our mahogany transformer table, very comfortable, stylish and sturdy.

Having had a first meal sitting on these chairs, I would say they are very comfortable, possibly more than the remaining wooden chairs at the table. They seem to be of sturdy construction and easily open and close. They are flat but quite thick when folded, so that would be the trade-off for comfort. I would buy again.

I needed four chairs for when we have company and wanted something comfortable, attractive and easy to store. These seem to fit the bill. I haven't actually used the chairs but I checked them over carefully on delivery and they are in good condition. The packaging was very well designed which makes me think the manufacturer has taken pride in the product. Fingers crossed.
